data.text: @noxcato Expired date coming for this lot, I can feel it…
@noxcato I’m blocked by every single one of them apart from Reicher 😂

@noxcato @VintageMrHobbes I've made a few improvements and I think it's perfect now. See what you think:

No C Pagel
No D Gurdasani
No S Michie
No T Greenhalgh
No D Sridhar
No S Reicher
No K Yates
No G Scally
@noxcato Which is worse, racist comments about prioritizing vaccination of British kids over at-risk Africans, or the constant barrage of ludicrous analogies. At least the latter are sometimes funny
@james_e_b_ True! I'm thinking of replacing Kit-Kat Yates with Costello. 🤔
